cleaned_text: Why Choose Alternative Health Care Center We help you regain health We don't treat symptoms We find the underlying cause of a condition The Alternative Health Care Center Is Here For One Purpose Only: To support and optimize our patients' health to their highest potential through our services and education. We offer the highest quality of natural health solutions through Nutrition Response Testing, Chiropractic, dietary modification, and a variety of other services, allowing the individual to experience true vitality without drugs and medication. What our clients are saying "After seeing Dr. Jantz for problems caused by a concussion suffered in ice hockey I was able to focus and perform daily tasks again." "By the end of the 21-day cleanse I had lost 15 lbs. I felt so good and was having such success, I decided to stay on it. After 2 1/2 months I have lost 30 lbs and i feel great." "Since working with Dr. Shell I am a completely different person. All my symptoms from my thyroid problems are GONE, and I have a new lease on life!" Are You Ready to Take The Next Step to True Health ? Let's
